summary: In this mod you will be astounded by the audacity of these NPCs GAURUNTEED! COMPATIBLE WITH ALL FORMS OF DLC!!
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------------------------------
NEWEST REALESE!

1.5.5
WHAT'S NEW:
Added more unique NPCS to fight! BOSS ON!
BUG FIXES:
Cows are now bigger
Giants and Mammoths are smaller due to a collision bug
Wolves are now bigger
Other fixes
IMPROVEMENTS;
Better drop system
Smoother gameplay
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DESCRIPTION:

Skyrim can get pretty boring after seeing all the NPCS and wishing there was something you could do to make it more entertaining. Well well well do I have the mod for you! In the Bigger & Better NPCS mod you can take that leap of faith that still creates lore friendly gameplay, but changes the basic concepts. In the mod there are currently:
8+ Supported NPCS including bears, wolves, and even GIANTS yes that's right Giants!
3 Unique BOSS mods that appear randomly
1 Spell enhancement that's right we made conjuration a bigger deal
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Jobbomb6

files.name: 1_5_5 MASTER FILE
files.changelogHtml:
3 NEW Unique BOSS NPCS
FIXED bugs with some animals not working!
Improved the drop system incorporated with this mod
